entry.title: 排序算法
entry.content:
排序

1. 选择、冒泡、插入

#include <iostream>#include <vector>using namespace std;void Randnum(vector<int>& nums, int n){nums.clear();nums.resize(n);for (int i = 0; i < n; i++){nums[i] = rand() % 100;                 // 0-32767cout << nums[i] << " ";}cout << endl;}void swap(int& a, int& b){int t = a;a = b;b = t;}// 冒泡排序void BubbleSort(vector<int>& nums){for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nums.size() - 1; i++)                  // 外层循环，遍历次数{for (unsigned int j = 0; j < nums.size() - i - 1; j++){if (nums[j] > nums[j + 1])swap(nums[j], nums[j + 1]);}}}// 选择排序void SelectSort(vector<int>& nums){// 选择排序，选择最小的放在最前面for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nums.size() - 1; i++){for (unsigned int j = i + 1; j < nums.size(); j++){if (nums[i] > nums[j])swap(nums[i], nums[j]);}}}// 插入排序void InsertSort(vector<int>& nums){int i, j;for (i = 1; i < nums.size(); i++){int temp = nums[i];                // 临时变量暂时保存nums[i]；for (j = i - 1; j >= 0 && nums[j] > temp; j--){nums[j + 1] = nums[j];     // 遇到比temp大的就要向后移动，并且不会覆盖元素；}nums[j + 1] = temp;                // 在指定位置插入nums[i]；}}int main(){vector<int> nums;int len = 10;Randnum(nums, len);InsertSort(nums);// 输出结果for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++){cout << nums[i] << " ";}cout << endl;system("pause");return 0;}

2. 希尔排序

#include <iostream>#include <vector>using namespace std;void Randnum(vector<int>& nums, int n){nums.clear();nums.resize(n);for (int i = 0; i < n; i++){nums[i] = rand();                 // 0-32767cout << nums[i] << " ";}cout << endl;}void swap(int& a, int& b){int t = a;a = b;b = t;}// 希尔排序void ShellSort(vector<int>& nums, int len){// 方案1：利用选择排序对子序列进行排序//for (int gap = len / 2; gap > 0; gap = gap / 2)//{//for (int i = gap; i < len; i++)                       //{//int j = i;//while (j - gap >= 0 && nums[j] < nums[j - gap])  //{//swap(nums[j], nums[j - gap]);//j = j - gap;//}//}//}// 方案2：利用插入排序对子序列进行排序，效率更高int i, j, temp;for (int gap = len / 2; gap > 0; gap = gap / 2){for (i = gap; i < nums.size(); i++){temp = nums[i];for (j = i - gap; j >= 0 && nums[j] > temp; j = j - gap){nums[j + gap] = nums[j];}nums[j + gap] = temp;}}}int main(){vector<int> nums;int len = 10;Randnum(nums, len);ShellSort(nums, nums.size());// 输出结果for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++){cout << nums[i] << " ";}cout << endl;system("pause");return 0;}

3. 快速排序

参考资料：(32条消息) 快速排序_明天一定早起的博客-CSDN博客_快速排序

#include <iostream>#include <vector>using namespace std;void Randnum(vector<int>& nums, int n){nums.clear();nums.resize(n);for (int i = 0; i < n; i++){nums[i] = rand();                 // 0-32767cout << nums[i] << " ";}cout << endl;}// 递归实现的快速排序void QuickSort(vector<int>& nums, int start, int end){if (start >= end)return;int small = start;                    // 表示小于主元的数int big = end;                        // 表示大于主元的数int standard = nums[small];           // 选定主元while (small < big){while (small < big && nums[big] >= standard){big--;}nums[small] = nums[big];while (small < big && nums[small] <= standard) {small++;}nums[big] = nums[small];}nums[small] = standard;QuickSort(nums, start, small - 1);QuickSort(nums, small + 1, end);}int main(){vector<int> nums;int len = 10;Randnum(nums, len);QuickSort(nums, 0, nums.size()-1);// 输出结果for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++){cout << nums[i] << " ";}cout << endl;system("pause");return 0;}

4. 归并排序

参考资料：(32条消息) 分治的典型应用：归并排序（C++实现）_年少挽滑稽世无双的博客-CSDN博客_分治算法实现归并排序c语言

#include <iostream>#include <vector>using namespace std;void Randnum(vector<int>& nums, int n){nums.clear();nums.resize(n);for (int i = 0; i < n; i++){nums[i] = rand();                 // 0-32767cout << nums[i] << " ";}cout << endl;}//将数组 a 的局部 a[s,m]和 a[m+1,e]合并到 tmp,并保证 tmp有序，然后再拷贝回 a[s,m] void Merge(vector<int>& nums, int start, int mid, int end, vector<int>& tmp){int pb = 0;int p1 = start;int p2 = mid + 1;while (p1 <= mid && p2 <= end){if (nums[p1] <= nums[p2])    //如果是if(a[p1] < a[p2])那么归并排序就不稳定了tmp[pb++] = nums[p1++];elsetmp[pb++] = nums[p2++];}while (p1 <= mid){tmp[pb++] = nums[p1++];}while (p2 <= end){tmp[pb++] = nums[p2++];}for (int i = 0; i< end - start + 1; ++i)nums[start + i] = tmp[i];}// 归并排序void MergeSort(vector<int>& nums, int start, int end, vector<int>& tmp){//通过二分(折半)划分子序列并且通过递归不断的去划分   if (start < end)//当子序列中只有一个元素时结束递归  {int mid = start + (end - start) / 2;MergeSort(nums, start, mid, tmp);//左子序列  MergeSort(nums, mid + 1, end, tmp);//右子序列    Merge(nums, start, mid, end, tmp);//左右子序列合并并保证有序  }}int main(){vector<int> nums;int len = 10;Randnum(nums, len);vector<int> temp(nums.size());MergeSort(nums, 0, nums.size() - 1, temp);// 输出结果for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++){cout << nums[i] << " ";}cout << endl;system("pause");return 0;}

5. 堆排序

参考资料：(32条消息) C++实现排序算法之堆排序_是个可爱的小伙砸的博客-CSDN博客_c++堆排序

#include <iostream>#include <vector>using namespace std;void Randnum(vector<int>& nums, int n){nums.clear();nums.resize(n);for (int i = 0; i < n; i++){nums[i] = rand();                 // 0-32767cout << nums[i] << " ";}cout << endl;}// n 表示数组长度// i 表示父节点位置void heapfi(vector<int>& tree, int n, int i)  //对一颗完全二叉树的指定非叶子节点及其叶子结点进行堆的建立{if (i >= n) {  //如果i>=n的时候，证明数组中的元素都已经建立成大根堆了，这是递归终止标志return;}int lchild = i * 2 + 1;    //左孩子节点的下标int rchild = i * 2 + 2;   //右孩子节点的下标int max = i;              //默认数值最大的节点为该非叶子节点的值if (lchild < n && tree[lchild] > tree[max]) {  //判断左孩子节点是否在索引范围内及左孩子结点值是否大于根节点max = lchild;           //大于的话就将较大值的下标记录在max中}if (rchild < n && tree[rchild] > tree[max]) {   //同上max = rchild;}if (max != i) {swap(tree[max], tree[i]);   //如果最大值的下标改变，则需要交换两个下标所对应的值heapfi(tree, n, max);   //对剩下的不是完全二叉树的元素继续进行堆的建立}}void build_heap(vector<int>& tree, int n){int last_node = n - 1;int parent = (last_node - 1) / 2;  //从一棵树的最后一个非叶子节点开始建立堆for (int i = parent; i >= 0; i--){heapfi(tree, n, i);}}// 堆排序void HeapSort(vector<int>& nums, int len){build_heap(nums, len);  //先建立一个大根堆for (int i = len - 1; i >= 0; i--)  //循环交换大根堆中的第一个元素和最后一个元素，并将交换后的最后一个元素出局{swap(nums[i], nums[0]);  //交换第一个元素和最后一个元素heapfi(nums, i, 0);    //调整剩下元素的位置，构建一个新的大根堆，从i号元素开始，即是将交换后的最后一个元素出局}}int main(){vector<int> nums;int len = 10;Randnum(nums, len);HeapSort(nums, nums.size());// 输出结果for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++){cout << nums[i] << " ";}cout << endl;system("pause");return 0;}

6. 计数排序

参考资料：(32条消息) 什么是计数排序？_独L无二的博客-CSDN博客_计数排序

#include <iostream>#include <vector>using namespace std;void Randnum(vector<int>& nums, int n){nums.clear();nums.resize(n);for (int i = 0; i < n; i++){nums[i] = rand();                 // 0-32767cout << nums[i] << " ";}cout << endl;}// 计数排序void CountSort(vector<int>& nums, int len){// 计算数组中的最大值和最小值int min = nums[0];int max = nums[0];for (int i = 1; i < len; i++){if (nums[i] < min)min = nums[i];if (nums[i] > max)max = nums[i];}int length = max - min + 1;vector<int> temp(length, 0);for (int i = 0; i < len; i++)temp[nums[i] - min]++;int j = 0;for (int i = 0; i < length; i++){while (temp[i] > 0){nums[j++] = min + i;temp[i]--;}}}int main(){vector<int> nums;int len = 10;Randnum(nums, len);CountSort(nums, nums.size());// 输出结果for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++){cout << nums[i] << " ";}cout << endl;system("pause");return 0;}

7. 基数排序

参考资料：(32条消息) 基数排序详解，(含图解过程，每行代码详细注解，包你学会）_正在努力的小宇的博客-CSDN博客_基数排序流程图

#include <iostream>#include <vector>using namespace std;void Randnum(vector<int>& nums, int n){nums.clear();nums.resize(n);for (int i = 0; i < n; i++){nums[i] = rand();                 // 0-32767cout << nums[i] << " ";}cout << endl;}// 求取整数的长度intInt_length(int n){int sum = 0;while (n){n /= 10;sum++;}return sum;}// 基数排序void RadixSort(vector<int>& nums, int len){// 计算数组中的最大值int max = nums[0];for (int i = 1; i < len; i++){if (nums[i] > max)max = nums[i];}int length = Int_length(max);vector<vector<int>>bucket = vector<vector<int>>(10, vector<int>(nums.size()));vector<int> count(10);int i = 0;int x = 1;for (; i < length; i++, x *= 10){for (int j = 0; j < nums.size(); j++){int r = nums[j] / x % 10;bucket[r][count[r]] = nums[j];count[r]++;}int index = 0;for (int j = 0; j < 10; j++){if (count[j] != 0){for (int k = 0; k < count[j]; k++){nums[index] = bucket[j][k];index++;}count[j] = 0;}}}}int main(){vector<int> nums;int len = 10;Randnum(nums, len);RadixSort(nums, nums.size());// 输出结果for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++){cout << nums[i] << " ";}cout << endl;system("pause");return 0;}

8. 桶排序

参考资料：(32条消息) C++桶排序_四叶草姚的博客-CSDN博客_c++桶排序

#include <iostream>#include <vector>using namespace std;void Randnum(vector<int>& nums, int n){nums.clear();nums.resize(n);for (int i = 0; i < n; i++){nums[i] = rand() % 100 ;                 // 0-32767cout << nums[i] << " ";}cout << endl;}void swap(int& a, int& b){int t = a;a = b;b = t;}// 冒泡排序 —— 对桶内数据进行排序void BubbleSort(vector<int>& nums, int len){for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nums.size() - 1; i++)                  // 外层循环，遍历次数{for (unsigned int j = 0; j < nums.size() - i - 1; j++){if (nums[j] > nums[j + 1])swap(nums[j], nums[j + 1]);}}}// 桶排序void BucketSort(vector<int>& nums, int len){// 计算数组中的最大值和最小值int max = nums[0];int min = nums[0];for (int i = 1; i < len; i++){if (nums[i] < min)min = nums[i];if (nums[i] > max)max = nums[i];}int k = 10;               // 区间的大小int BucketNum = (max - min) / k + 1;vector<vector<int>> buckets(BucketNum);for (int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++){int value = nums[i];buckets[(value - min) / k].push_back(value);}int index = 0;vector<int> temp;// 对桶内的数进行排序for (int i = 0; i < BucketNum; i++){if (buckets[i].size() > 0){temp.clear();for (int j = 0; j < buckets[i].size(); j++){temp.push_back(buckets[i][j]);}// 对桶内数据进行冒泡排序BubbleSort(temp, buckets[i].size());for (int k = 0; k < buckets[i].size(); k++){nums[index++] = temp[k];}}}}int main(){vector<int> nums;int len = 10;Randnum(nums, len);BucketSort(nums, nums.size());// 输出结果for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++){cout << nums[i] << " ";}cout << endl;system("pause");return 0;}
entry.summary: 排序

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
